subtitleNullable: scalable video/label competitive dataset produced by high rank csgo player
descriptionNullable:
scalable video/label competitive dataset produced by high rank csgo player
## how dataset recorded
we crawled demos from gameplatform and used some reverse engineering way to infer the player action.
the video was recorded 32 fps on 128tick server that plays the demo.
action_label was infered every 8ticks a.k.a 1/16 sec.
THE DATA SET IS STILL UNDER-PROGRESS.

## todo
- customize  pytorch DataSet object
- expert demostration clean data.
- possibly more maps other than just dust2

## **update**
20220605: added more videos,  providing full t player csv file
20220530: first example dataset.

produce tool:
https://github.com/jackal-u/csgo_competitive_dataset_tool
ai_training_example:
https://github.com/jackal-u/csgo_behavior_cloning_ai

## contact
i'm maintaining this dataset for research purpose. 
if there is any problem, please contact me.
